title: Parables and tales
by_statement: by Thomas Gordon Hake ... ; with illustrations by Arthur Hughes.
publishers: Dalziel Brothers [Engravers and Printers], Camden Press

notes.value:
Advertisements at end.
LC Copy 1 in publisher's gold-stamped pictorial dark blue cloth, all edges gilt.
LC Copy 2 in publisher's green cloth with gold-stamped device and ruled border.
LC Copy 3 in publisher's gold-stamped pictorial green cloth, all edges gilt.  Binding designed by Dante Gabriel Rossetti [per inscription on free endpaper].
